Text: Thank you. So this is the first book of the trilogy...

Yes, this is the first book of the original trilogy. There are subsequent prequels and sequels as well.

There are some other torrents for the rest of the series, unfortunately most are of poor sound quality. 

Scott Brick is an excellent reader, and this is fresh from the CDs.

Enjoy!
Actually, you should listen to Prelude to Foundation first. It's all about the man behind Psycho-History and it's beginning. Excellent book!

I suggest reading them in the order they were published.  The two prequels will be much more interesting that way.  I look forward to hearing Scott Brick's version.  I remember the old versions had poor sound and were even missing parts.
Excellent quality, nothing missing as I have heard yet :)
g-roid can you please upload other parts ? or suggest a torrent ? This one contains next two parts read by Scott Brick should i download it ? thepiratebay.org/torrent/4433910
Yes both parts are great. So I have the original trilogy read by Scott what about other parts? anyone.
